verses.name: 1 Samuel 11:13
verses.text: And Saul said, There shall not a man be put to death this day: for to day the Lord hath wrought salvation in Israel.

verses.name: 1 Samuel 11:14
verses.text: Then said Samuel to the people, Come, and let us go to Gilgal, and renew the kingdom there.

verses.name: 1 Samuel 11:15
verses.text: And all the people went to Gilgal; and there they made Saul king before the Lord in Gilgal; and there they sacrificed sacrifices of peace offerings before the Lord; and there Saul and all the men of Israel rejoiced greatly.
